data.name: Amazon
data.author: C4V
data.description:
Same day shipping with cheap pricing.
This is A simple mod. It makes production time as close to zero as possible and all the equipment is roughtly 50% off. I also made it so the barge is roughtly double its normal speed.
Fixes :
Fixed ammo count (Might break previous saves) Fixed buying 20mm crashing the game
